welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hartbeespoort, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes, adventurous activities, and friendly people. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lanseria Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is free for the first 30 minutes, after which a fee may apply.
